snippet: Representative Charles B. Rangel showed no ill will toward Adriano Espaillat for challenging him for Congress, though Mr. Rangel was quick to emphasize his own work for his Latino constituents.
abstract: Representative Charles B. Rangel showed no ill will toward Adriano Espaillat for challenging him for Congress, though Mr. Rangel was quick to emphasize his own work for his Latino constituents.

headline.main: Rangel Sounds Confident of Re-election While Speaking Well of Challenger
headline.print_headline: Rangel Speaks Well of His Election Chances, and of His Rival
